hero.badge: The innovative solution for school replacements
hero.title: Teacha - The first school-substitute connection platform in Switzerland
hero.subtitle: Simplify school replacement management with our innovative solution that intelligently connects schools with qualified substitutes.

practicalTips.introduce: Introduce yourself to colleagues in neighboring classes
practicalTips.cleanup: Leave the classroom tidy when you leave

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

duration.question: How long does the pilot project last?
duration.answer: The pilot project lasts 6 months, during which participating schools get free access to all features.

after.question: What happens after the pilot project?
after.answer: Schools participating in the pilot project will get a 50% discount on their first annual subscription.

hidden.question: Are there any hidden fees?
hidden.answer: No, our pricing policy is completely transparent. There are no hidden fees or long-term commitments.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions quickly

contact.title: Need additional help?
contact.description: Our team is here to help you. Don't hesitate to contact us.

platform.question: How does the platform work?
platform.answer: Schools publish their replacement needs, and substitutes can apply directly to offers that match their profile. The connection is instant and communication is facilitated through our integrated messaging.

requirements.question: What are the requirements to become a substitute?
requirements.answer: You must have the required qualifications to teach and go through our verification process. Your profile will be validated by our team before being activated.

cost.question: How much does using the platform cost?
cost.answer: Registration is free for substitutes. For schools, we currently offer a special free 'pilot project' offer for the first 5 institutions.

verification.question: How are substitute profiles verified?
verification.answer: Each profile is manually verified by our team. We check diplomas, references and other documents provided to guarantee the quality of our service.

response.question: What is the response time for an application?
response.answer: Schools are immediately notified of your application and can respond quickly. For urgent replacements, we recommend schools respond within 24 hours.

messaging.question: How does messaging work?
messaging.answer: Integrated messaging allows schools and substitutes to communicate directly on the platform. You receive notifications for each new message.

technical.question: What to do in case of technical problems?
technical.answer: In case of technical problems, contact our support at hello@cta-ecom.com. Our team is committed to responding to you as soon as possible.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: RemplaceProf simplifies the connection between schools and substitutes. Discover how our platform can help you.

step1.title: 1. Create your profile
step1.description: Sign up as a substitute and complete your profile with your skills and availability.

step2.title: 2. Find assignments
step2.description: Browse replacement offers that match your profile and criteria.

step3.title: 3. Apply easily
step3.description: Apply in just a few clicks and communicate directly with schools.

step4.title: 4. Manage your assignments
step4.description: Track your applications and organize your replacement schedule.

step1.title: 1. Register your school
step1.description: Create your school's profile and specify your specific needs.

step2.title: 2. Post your needs
step2.description: Create detailed replacement offers in just a few minutes.

step3.title: 3. Select your substitutes
step3.description: Review applications and choose the ideal profile for your class.

step4.title: 4. Communicate directly
step4.description: Exchange with candidates and organize replacements efficiently.

footer.description: The first school-substitute connection platform in Switzerland

contentRedaction.title: Content and Writing
contentRedaction.description: Teacha is the secure web communication solution for substitutes and schools, complying with all GDPR regulations.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content1: The content of these web pages is maintained with the greatest care. However, we disclaim any responsibility for their content.
disclaimer.content2: Printing errors, mistakes and modifications reserved.
disclaimer.content3: All copyrights belong to Teacha. The content of this website cannot be used without authorization from Teacha, and the source must be indicated.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: Personal data transmitted when filling out forms is confidential and will not be transmitted to third parties.

object.title: Object
object.description: These conditions govern the use of the Teacha platform, which offers a connection service between schools and substitute teachers.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of conditions
acceptance.description: By using the Teacha platform, you accept these general terms and conditions of sale and service.

pilot.title: Pilot phase
pilot.description: During the pilot project phase, access to the platform is free for all schools and substitutes.

paidServices.title: Paid services
paidServices.description: After the pilot phase, access to certain services will become paid for schools in the form of subscriptions.

registration.title: Registration required
registration.description: To access services, schools and substitutes must create an account by providing accurate and complete information.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: Each user is responsible for the security of their account and password.

payment.title: Payment terms
payment.description: Paid subscriptions for schools will be billed via Stripe. Subscription fee details will be provided before subscription.

renewal.title: Renewal and cancellation
renewal.description: The subscription is automatically renewed unless canceled before the renewal date.

conduct.title: User conduct
conduct.description: Users undertake to use the platform ethically and in accordance with applicable laws.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Users must treat information obtained via Teacha confidentially.

rights.title: Rights
rights.description: The content of Teacha, including texts, graphics, logos, etc., is protected by intellectual property law and remains the exclusive property of Teacha.

prohibitions.title: Prohibitions
prohibitions.description: It is forbidden to reproduce, modify or exploit the contents of the platform without express authorization from Teacha.

warranties.title: Warranties
warranties.description: Teacha does not guarantee that the service will be free from interruptions or errors.

limitation.title: Limitation of liability
limitation.description: Teacha will not be responsible for indirect damages resulting from the use of the platform.

right.title: Right to modify
right.description: Teacha reserves the right to modify the general conditions at any time.

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Modifications will be notified to users through the platform or by email.

law.title: Applicable law
law.description: These conditions are governed and interpreted in accordance with Swiss law.

courts.title: Jurisdiction
courts.description: Any dispute relating to the use of Teacha will be subject to the competent courts of Biel, Switzerland.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding these conditions, please contact Teacha:

marie.name: Marie L.

school.name: Lilas School
school.content: Considerable time savings in our search for substitutes. The process is smooth and allows us to efficiently manage unexpected absences.

thomas.name: Thomas R.
